LOGIN_FAILED_EMAIL_NOT_CONFIRMED: Login failed because the email address has not been confirmed.
EMAIL_NOT_WHITELISTED: Your email address must be activated first by an admin.
CONFIRM_EMAIL: Please check your mailbox and click on the confirmation link before you login!
NAME: Name
NEW_PASSWORD_NOT_MATCHING_REPEAT: New password does not match repeated password!
CHOOSE_GROUP: Please sign in to a group in order to choose your appointments »
CREATE_GROUP_TEXT: Provide the email addresses of your group partners in order to create a group.
CHOOSE_AUDIO_PRIORITIES_TEXT:
Choose your priorities for the audio project for your group {{groupname}}.
The deadline for the registration is on {{ ddln | date: 'EEE, M/d/yy h:mm a' }}.
CHOOSE_VIDEO_PRIORITIES_TEXT:
Choose your priorities for the video project for your group {{groupname}}.
The deadline for the registration is on {{ ddln | date: 'EEE, M/d/yy h:mm a' }}.
CHOOSE_PHOTO_PRIORITIES_TEXT:
Choose your priorities for the photo project for your group {{groupname}}.
The deadline for the registration is on {{ ddln | date: 'EEE, M/d/yy h:mm a' }}.
CREATE_NEW_AUDIO_LAB_APPOINTMENT: Create new appointment for the audio lab
CREATE_NEW_VIDEO_LAB_APPOINTMENT: Create new appointment for the video lab
CREATE_NEW_PHOTO_LAB_APPOINTMENT: Create new appointment for the photo lab
MISSING_PRIORITIES: You have {{number}} priorities left to set.
CREATE_TUTORIAL: Create new tutorial for {{ weekday | translate }}
UPLOAD_LIST_TEXT: Upload here the students list, so they can register:
UPLOADED_CSV_TEXT: These emails have been retrieved from the CSV file:
TUTORIAL_GROUP_TEXT_1: To participate in Labs you have to be part of a group.
TUTORIAL_GROUP_TEXT_2: Here you can create a new group with your fellow students or join a random group.
ALREADY_IN_GROUP: You can't create a group because you are already member of another group.
NOT_ENOUGH_MEMBERS: Your group has not enough members.
EMAILS_NOT_REGISTERED: One or more emails are not registered on this platform.
OWN_EMAIL_NOT_ALLOWED: You can't add your own email address. You are automatically part of the created group.
REALLY_LEAVE_GROUP: Do you really want to leave and delete the group?
GROUP_LEAVE_NOT_UNDOABLE: This cannot be undone - All other group members will also leave the group.
SHOULD_CREATE_TERM: Before you begin you should create a term. Do you want to do that now?
RANDOM_GROUP_TEXT_1: You don't care who is part of your group?
RANDOM_GROUP_TEXT_2: Click here to join a random group.
WRONG_CAPTCHA: Please solve the captcha to log in.
COURSE_FULL: There are no more free seats in this tutorial
EMAIL_NOT_REAL: Your email address must be real.
PASSWORD_REQUIREMENTS: Your password must be at least 8 characters long and contain an uppercase letter and a digit.
REPEAT_PASSWORD_NO_MATCH: This must match your previously given password.
STUDENT_EXERCISE_TEXT: Here you can join a tutorial, so the schedules are shown in your calendar.
ADMIN_EXERCISE_TEXT: Here you can create tutorials as admin, so the students can join them.
ADMIN_DATES_TEXT: Here you can set important schedules, e.g. for exams.
INVALID_NUMBER: This field must have a number greater than 0
REALLY_DELETE_TERM: Do you realy want to delete this term?
TERM_DATA_GETS_LOST: All data connected to this term will be lost.
NOT_VERIFIED: Your E-Mail Address has not yet been verified. Please check your Inbox.
ADMIN_USERS_TEXT: Here you can assign a user to another term and remove users from the system as admin.
CHECK3: A tutor is assigned to every lab
ADMIN_DIST_TEXT: Here an automatic distribution of groups onto lab dates can be started. Before you can begin, all check (see below) have to be successful.
NO_LAB: The following groups did not get a lab:
GOT_LAB: The following groups got a lab:
EMAIL_TUT: The E-Mail Addresses of all students who got a lab date
FAIL_EMAIL_TUT: The E-Mail Addresses of all students who did not get a lab date
ADMIN_WHITELIST_TEXT: Here you can add new users. Only after that they can register.
ADMIN_TERM_TEXT: Here you can create a new term, edit the current term, and delete old terms.
ADMIN_LABTYPES_TEXT: Here you can manage the projects (edit descriptions, set deadlines, activate priority selection).
PRIO_MESSAGE: You still have to select {{ count }} priorities.
PRIO_MESSAGE_DONE: Your group already has selected all priorities
LAB_DELETE_ALERT: This date can not be deleted, because there already have been priorities saved.
SELECTION_NOT_OPEN: The selection is currently not open.
SELECTION_OPEN: The selection is open and ends at {{ ddln | date: 'EEE, M/d/yy h:mm a' }}
NO_GROUP_SELECTION: You have to be in a group to save priorities for the project.
NO_ASSIGNED_TUTOR_LABS_PHOTO: You are not yet assigned as tutor to any photo project appointment this semester.
NO_ASSIGNED_TUTOR_LABS_VIDEO: You are not yet assigned as tutor to any video project appointment this semester.
NO_ASSIGNED_TUTOR_LABS_AUDIO: You are not yet assigned as tutor to any audio project appointment this semester.
MY_TUTOR_LABS_PHOTO: Photo projects that I'm assigned to as tutor
MY_TUTOR_LABS_VIDEO: Video projects that I'm assigned to as tutor
MY_TUTOR_LABS_AUDIO: Audio projects that I'm assigned to as tutor
